content.rendered:
Overview

CRC is a name that is widely recognized for delivering what is promised. It holds a strong legacy of trust, transparency & reliability for the last 37 years. Our professionally managed, strong team of experts makes us one of the leading developers in the real estate sector. Known for serving a long list of clientele, CRC has grown exponentially over the years with well-planned layouts and meticulously executed projects.

At CRC, we always think ahead, keeping our customers delight in focus. The group is committedto setting new standards in the realty sector by unveiling the finest structures, which will be a true reflection of perfection and excellence.

The CRC Group has a proven track record in fulfilling the client’s requirements by delivering perfection and meeting their expectations at every step. Setting a new benchmark for real estate solutions, CRC maintains high standards to build exquisite living and working spaces.

2 BHK LUXURY APARTMENTS

3 BHK LUXURY APARTMENTS

HIGHLIGHTS

CHANGE TO HOMES WITH A RESORT-LIKE LIFESTYLE

Live the way you would in a resort. It has all been designed to give you a relaxed outlook.
  • Each tower at Joyous has been planned with individual drop-off zone
  • Grand entrance lobby with access to central green
  • Dedicated 3 lifts for each tower with separate premium lobby area Aesthetically designed foyer entrance with an excellent carpet area
  • Utility area for washing machine and other household work
  • Ingenious and efficient
  • Smart utilization of spaces
  • Maximum privacy and minimum disturbance ensured Modern and minimalist features with one point spoke of luxury

CHANGE TO HOMES WITH WORLD-CLASS SPORTS FACILITIES

Be a sport for life with the sports facilities here; whatever be your preference, you have a choice.

  • Flooring: Vitrified tiles flooring in living and dining (1200mm X 600mm).
  • Wooden flooring in master bedroom, vitrified tile flooring in bedrooms (600mm X 600mm), vitrified tiles in kitchen & Ceramic tiles in toilets.
  • Staircase to be provided in Granite flooring/ marble or equivalent, balconies will be in anti-skid ceramic flooring
  • Dado: Ceramic tiles till lintel height in toilets &
  • 600mm height above kitchen counters slab in
  • appropriate color & print.
  • Exterior: Appropriate finish of texture paint of exterior grade weather proof or equivalent

CHANGE TO HOMES WITH AN ACTIVE SOCIAL LIFE

Love to mingle? This is the place for you. Whether it’s about old friends coming over or making new ones in the neighborhood, your social life is sure to thrive here.

• Stainless steel sink (Lotus, Jayna or equivalent), premium cp fitting. (Grohe/ Kohler / Jaquar or Equivalent).

Doors & windows: Entrance door- 8 feet high-

polished/ enamel paint hard wood frame, both side

laminated flush door with tower bolt. Locks-Dorset,

Godrej Ipsa or equivalent)

• Internal door – 7 feet high polished/ enamel paint- hard wood frame, laminated flush door. External door & Window-uPVC with provision for one wire mesh shutter.

CHANGE TO HOMES WHERE THE KIDS HAVE FUN TOO

Anytime is fun-time here for the little ones. All their need for excitement and activities has been well taken care of.

  • Lift: 2 Passenger lifts & 1 Service lift. (Mitsubishi Schindler Otis or equivalent)
  • Generators: Generator to be provided for 100% power backup of emergency lifts, common areas
  • Clubhouse & sports facilities: Clubhouse with swimming pool to be provided with changing rooms for both male & femides, well equipped gym, indoor & outdoor games areas, table tennis & card rooms, kids play ama. Squash, Multipurpose Hall. Jogging track, Tennis court, Billiants, Karaoke rooms Private Family Lange
  • Security & FTTH: Provision for optical fiber/network wire perimeter security and entrance lobby security with
  • CCTV cameras Fire Safety: Fire prevenza, sunsalon, detection & alarm system as per time norms.
  • Structure: Earthkesistance RCC framed structure as it applicable seatule une

  • Each tower at Joyous has been planned with individual drop-off zone
  • Grand entrance lobby with access to central green

  • Utility area for washing machine and other household work
  • Ingenious and efficient

  • Maximum privacy and minimum disturbance ensured Modern and minimalist features with one point spoke of luxury

ABOUT CRC GROUP
One of the most prestigious names in the real estate industry is the developer CRC Group. Quality, trust, and innovation are the hallmarks of this brand. The developer is well-known for finishing projects on time and providing incredible amenities at the development. Call us for information about its latest development! This article only contains information about a forthcoming project.
 

Site Address : CRC Homes Pvt. Ltd. Plot No. 8A, TechZone IV, Greater Noida (West), UP-203201
